title: Three Husbands (1950 Classic, Film Noir, Comedy, Eve Arden)

sources.title: Three Husbands (1950 Classic, Film Noir, Comedy, Eve Arden)
sources.description: STORYLINE : When a recently deceased playboy gets to heaven and is granted one wish--granted to all newcomers--he requests that he be able to see the reactions of three husbands, with whom he regularly played poker, to a letter he left each of them claiming to have had an affair with each's wife. _IMDb by frankfob2 TRIVIA: Screenwriter, Vera Caspary also contributed to a similar film, '' A Letter to Three Wives '' (1949) ** The non-profit streaming of the commercial free, quality films I have very much enjoyed and therefore uploaded to archive.org , are for educational purposes . I have uploaded each movie for posterity , with the hope that all present and future generations will learn from and enjoy them, as much as I have. I own zero rights to this film, nor to any other I have uploaded, and I receive nothing for the uploads nor for the information I put with those uploads. Although I do receive great joy from sharing these uploads with you, I have no wish to infringe on any existing copyright laws . DEF gp ddh ** (Ty, PizzaFlix! You find the BEST MOVIES!!)
